column2: text
For our survival, yes.
Though I have misgivings, the Meargh deems it so.
They will think me a Shearl. We agree.
We ask for this. If no, we will take what we need.
With lowered tails, we offer this.
You are fit for sacrifice, nothing more, but here is something.
Daemons are summoned. Consider this carefully…
We will come for your women-folk!
The Meargh bids us no.
You talk too much. Talk, talk, talk! We rot while you chatter!
The mists choke your vision and dulls your senses. Do you truly feel safe?
You stumble into our realm. Lost and confused.
Begone from here! These swamps are not for your kind.
The Meargh agrees to these terms.
To survive, to endure, yes.
Slaves and sacrifices are needed. Fimúl's eye demands it.
We offer this in Fimúl's name.
The Fimir come bearing an offer. Will you accept?
For safety and survival. Will you accept, yesssss?
Sadly no. The Meargh says no.
We cannot agree to this, tribe friend.
Fimúlneid does not wish this.
This is what I do. I plant stories in ground, watch them grow into truth.
Brave to deal with Bog Daemons.
We will make fine Belly-Plate from this.
We accept in Fimúlneid's name.
The tribe always has need of sacrifices.
We will chant your name around the fire!
The tribe will remember this great act!
You have the Meargh’s appreciation
And thus you abandon us, just as the four did.
We continue alone, as always.
Betrayal! The tribe won't forget this.
Fimúlneid curse you!
Pathetic, we will survive long after you rot in the ground.
This matters little. We have long endured alone.
We will destroy you, Fimúlneid wills it!
Rally the Fimm! We must fight to endure!
Summon the Dirach. War calls!
This no longer benefits the tribe.
The Meargh deems this ended.
This is lost to the mists.
Our tribe is in danger. Aid us!
Though we wish to be left alone, we need help.
The tribe marches for our survival. Will you join?
Gold! Gold is power! Power to punish other Fimir! Power to rule!
The Meargh asks the tribe to offer you this.
We offer this in Fimúl's name.
The mists extend their offer. Do you accept?
MmmMMMMMMmmm!!
Forget us. Leave us be.
You have nothing of use to us. Begone.
Together we are stronger, no?
We desire sacrifices and more. An agreement?
For our survival, cooperation?
Please, come to the castle. Please. Show them you want peace. Show them you will not harm us. Please, please, please…
A wise shepherd does not cull the entire herd, only what it needs to survive.
We dwindle. The Meargh calls for mercy.
Fimúlneid rises. Together we shall endure.
The eye commands we help you.
Together we will make ruin of our foes and cover their lands in mist.
The tribe offers gifts. Do you accept?
The swamps have many treasures known to us. Forgotten things.
The Meargh extends an offering.
You call us Bog Daemons, we are Fimir. Now talk? Talk.
You have found us in the mists. Now what?
We have existed for for many ages. We mean to keep it that way.
No peace. The Dirach call for your destruction!
Ware the mists, they call for your death.
The Fimm desire battle. No!
No. We must continue alone.
The Meargh says no. That is all.
We will survive alone. As we have for millenia.
The eye commands it.
We'll take sacrifices, slaves and more!
The swamps shall swallow your meagre lands!
I speak for the Meargh. Talk
We welcome you in the name of the fiery eye.
From the mists you emerge. Speak.
